column2: ENGLISH
We have an eager new recruit! I should let the [new_recruit.GetManWoman] know that [new_recruit.GetSheHe] needs prove [new_recruit.GetHerselfHimself] to [new_recruit.GetHerHis] new peers...

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] greets me with a brief nod. "Another recruit, huh? To join our ranks, you need to prove yourself, [Root.GetBoyGirl]", the [hero_character.GetManWoman] says gruffly, folding [hero_character.GetHerHis] arms across [hero_character.GetHerHis] chest. "You'd be fighting one of our own. Still interested, my [Root.GetLordLady]?"

[hero_character.GetTitledName] of [hero_character.Society.GetName] eyes me up and down, first skeptically, but then [hero_character.GetHerHis] posture relaxes. "Say, my [Root.GetLordLady]... Are you related to [founder_target.GetTitledFirstName]?". I nod, smiling. "That [founder_target.GetManWoman] is a legend!" [hero_character.GetSheHe] laughs. "I look forward to seeing you in action", [hero_character.GetSheHe] adds, squeezing my shoulder.

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] listened while I explained our tradition of one-on-one duels, but then rolled [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes and walked off. "I would rather not get involved with barbarians."

[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName] offered no protests when I explained our traditions, eyes all aglitter at the thought of an initiation duel. After some inquiry, [duel_target.GetTitledName] has kindly volunteered.

Just as [combatant_2.GetTitledName] was about to show [From.GetTitledName] what sparring match should look like, the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman] dropped [From.GetHerHis] weapon and ran..

Although I did not expect much, we were all stunned by the performance of [From.GetBestName] during [From.GetHerHis] initiation fight. It will be interesting to see what [From.GetSheHe] makes of [From.GetHerselfHimself], as a member of our ranks.

In spite of some bruises and mild injury, I was not alone in being satisfied with the skill displayed by [From.GetBestName]. While I am intrigued, only time will tell whether joining our ranks is the right path for the [From.GetAgeAdjective] [From.GetManWoman], or not.

[From.GetBestName] was rather seriously injured by [From.GetHerHis] opponent, [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName]. I expected my [combatant_2.GetRootRelation] to get in a blow or two, but I am mildly surprised that [From.GetTitledFirstName] still wants to join our ranks.

To the valiant [Root.GetTitledName],

I am told you did not receive a single scratch during your initiation! That is the kind of impressive [Root.GetWarriorRole] we would be honored to have sitting at our table. You are hereby humbly invited to join our ranks.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the honorable [Root.GetTitledName],

During your initiation, your display of bravery and good attitude impressed us all. We would gladly invite you into our ranks.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the brave [Root.GetTitledName],

I understand you were seriously injured during your initiation, but that you remained standing. To reward this display of strength in the duel, I hereby officially invite you into our ranks.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

To the COWARD [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
Needless to say, we are unimpressed by your behavior, and hope you do not seek us anytime soon, lest this offense escalates.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! I'll contact [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] right away, [Root.GetFatherMother]."
My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] smiles broadly at my encouragement. "I thought you would never ask! So... how do we do this, [Root.GetFatherMother]?"

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "[hero_character.GetSocietyRank] [hero_character.GetTitledFirstName] is a bore, [Root.GetFatherMother]."

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] rolls [new_recruit.GetHerHis] eyes at my attempted encouragement. "I will carve my own path, [Root.GetFatherMother]. Please, let me." When I do not respond, [new_recruit.GetSheHe] continues: "War and combat is dreadfully boring, [Root.GetFatherMother]."

My [new_recruit.GetAgeAdjective] [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, and not stopped talking about [new_recruit.GetHerHis] initiation duel. "It was exhilarating, [Root.GetFatherMother]! And now I am one of [new_recruit.Society.GetName]!".

My [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, but not said a single word for what feels like an eternity. When I try to coax some conversation out of the [new_recruit.GetBoyGirl], [new_recruit.GetSheHe] mumbles: "I am not like you, [Root.GetFatherMother]", face red with shame. "I failed my initiation rite."

My [new_recruit.GetSonDaughter] has joined me for dinner tonight, but not said a single word for what feels like an eternity. When I try to coax some conversation out of the [new_recruit.GetBoyGirl], [new_recruit.GetSheHe] mumbles: "Don't be mad. I changed my mind about joining [Root.Society.GetName]."

My [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] is making some less than subtle remarks over dinner tonight, commenting on my swordsmanship and asking how interested I am in strategy of war. "Honestly, [Root.GetFirstName]... When are you going to become a member of [recruiting_parent.Society.GetName]?"

My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that it does not matter which path I walk. "Whether you choose the way of the sword, or the way of the quill, you are my [Root.GetSonDaughter]." We spent the rest of the evening talking about other hopes and dreams of mine, and I can only smile fondly when I think of [From.GetHerHis] support.
My [From.GetFatherMother] tells me that [From.GetSheHe] expected more from my duel, before eating the remainder of [From.GetHerHis] dinner in silence.\nI feel awful.

Having learned what I can about one-on-one combat, swinging my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] being as easy as breathing, I have decided that it is time I focused on other pursuits common among [Root.Society.GetName].

Having lost count of the [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] trophies which decorate the many walls of [Root.Capital.GetName], maybe I should spend some time on other pursuits befitting a member of [Root.Society.GetName]?
Having studied many a tome on the topic, as well as the practical application of it, I am already well-versed in strategic warfare... Perhaps it is time I focused on something else?

My fellow members of [Root.Society.GetName] have long been wondering when I will choose a focus for my fighting talents. There are those who live for the art of dueling, while others prefer the more theoretic side of combat... Yet hunting is also a worthwhile pursuit.

I have studied my soldiers practicing their swordsmanship, and I am certain that some of them are becoming unsettled by the constant watch of their [Root.GetTitle]... Perhaps it is time I admit that I could use some guidance, when it comes to my own dueling? If nothing else, I could join their training...

My [From.GetRootRelation] [From.GetTitledFirstName] has contacted me, asking for private lessons in the arts of one-on-one combat. "The [From.GetTitle] is likely to appreciate any guidance we offer, my [Root.GetLordLady]", the messenger says.

When we started practicing together, I had a hard time imagining displaying the kind of expert confidence that [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] exudes on the battlefield. However, bolstered by [mentor_target.GetHerHis] training, I think I have truly found my calling.

Be careful where you point that thing! a courtier cried out today, as I was sauntering back from yet another session at the training grounds, idly playing with the sword in my hand. The woman hurriedly corrected herself: "Of course, a master duelist such as yourself would know best, my [Root.GetLordLady]."

The last time we spoke, [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] had only praise to offer me. It's an odd feeling that [mentor_target.GetSheHe] is not here to see me now. Letting out a sigh, I clear my mind, focusing on the feeling of my [Root.GetDuelWeapon] in my hand. It's so natural to me now, as if part of my body.

The stack of books in front of me is intimidating. My scholars tell me these are classics, for anyone interested in an introduction to strategic warfare. But I am [Root.GetTitledFirstName]! Surely, I do not need the basics? Should I not be out on the field, surveying the troops, first-hand?

My commanders have come to request my advice on some exercises they are performing outside the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] walls. "We could really use that strategic mind of yours, [Root.GetMasterMistress]", they say. Startled, I realize that my studying has paid off, and my chest swells with pride. I then collect myself, nodding: "Of course, I'd be happy to help."

The experienced hunters I have spending time with seem quite pleased with my weapons skills, and are wondering what I would like to explore next. Poring over the maps of the area outside of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName], my advisors suggest I learn more about the theory behind the tracking of various prey.

We have been tracking a wild [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal] for hours, when a growl sounds in the bushes next to us. A thunk, followed by a soft groan, tells me that my arrow has found its target. Relaxing my posture, I realize that the hunt is over. "They should be calling you [Root.GetTitledFirstName] the Hunter!" one of my companions laughs. I smile.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodNameCap] would be proud of you, [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, [GetWarriorLodgeTrainingDesc]
The dedication you display is admirable, [Root.GetSisterBrother], [fellow_member.GetTitledFirstName] tells me, [GetWarriorLodgeTrainingDesc]
Reports state that new recruits have been partaking in our initiation ritual, allowing [Root.Society.GetName] to be growing in numbers!

All my [Root.GetBrotherSister]s of [Root.Society.GetName] know that infections are best treated with a calming poultice, good sleep, and fresh air. I am not surprised to find that the foul smell is gone from my wound, leaving but a pale scar behind.
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind.

My injuries were extensive, but not enough to break me. Waking up this morning, I straighten my back. "This pain is temporary" I declare to my servant, who is watching me incredulously. The demons will have to try harder before [Root.GetTitledFirstName] surrenders to self-pity.
I am starting to think the physician who looked at my injury was mistaken. The wound from the maiming has healed completely! Maybe it was all a trick of the light?
The old wound has finally healed, leaving a pretty grotesque scar behind. Some fresh air and walks in the [Root.Location.GetTerrain] surrounding [Root.Location.GetName] was all I needed!

Give me your axe! NOW! I roar at the recruit. The young [Root.GetBoyGirl] obeys and the crowd around me gasps as I start swinging it around me, some scrambling to get out of my way. "[Root.GetFirstName], what are you doing?!" my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] yells in despair, clutching at [kinslayer_target.GetHerHis] bloodied tunic.

Someone get me an axe! I roar. The crowd gasps as I start swinging it around me, some scrambling in panic to get out of my way. One brave soul, [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName], steps in front of me, accepting the challenge. When we are done, we are laughing heartily. "I like your rage, [Root.GetBrotherSister]!" [kinslayer_target.GetSheHe] says, wiping the sweat from [kinslayer_target.GetHerHis] brow.

Someone get me an axe! NOW! I roar to the closest soldier I can find. In the corner of my eye, I see my [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] watching me. As I start swinging the weapon around, the rush of combat fills me. I find myself smiling, then laughing, from the bottom of my belly. [kinslayer_target.GetFirstName] is laughing too, and the crowd cheers me on.

[From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently went on a wild rampage through [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetCapitalHolding], and my poor [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in the crossfire!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has sworn vengeance upon me, for the loss of [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName]. I... don't suppose [From.GetSheHe] would accept it if I sent a courier to explain that it was an accident?
Warriors from the area surrounding [target_holding.Capital.GetName] flock to my banner, and the [target_holding.GetCapitalHolding] garrison is bursting with new recruits!

Our table is already full, [Root.GetSocietyRank]. Are you saying you want to fight me for the spot? [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] rises from [combatant_2.GetHerHis] seat, idly cracking [combatant_2.GetHerHis] knuckles and taking a step towards me.

Hail, [From.GetSocietyRank]!

You have proven yourself worthy of [Root.Society.GetName]. I admit defeat and hereby step back from the title you may now acquire – use it well. 

Signed, [Root.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [From.GetSocietyRank]!

While we mourn the loss, know that by defeating [combatant_2.GetTitledFirstName] you have more than proven yourself worthy of the title you wished to acquire – use it well.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]!

It was a valiant effort, but given the result of our duel, we cannot with good conscience let you advance to the next rank within [Root.Society.GetName]. I suggest you see more battle or spend some time in the training grounds.

Signed, [From.GetSocietyRank] [From.GetTitledFirstName]

I can't take it any longer. "Jailer!" I shout. For some reason the person who shows up on the other sides of the bars is a [crossfire_target.GetManWoman], saying "I heard we had a real brute down here. I got curious." I lash out at [crossfire_target.GetHerHis] smirk, punching the iron bar so hard my fingers crunch. My blood boils, but all I can do is crumple to the floor, the pain overwhelming my blood thirst.

I can't stand being confined here. In the corner of our cell, [crossfire_target.GetFirstName] stands, scratching something in the wall. "Doesn't it drive you mad?!" I growl at [crossfire_target.GetHerHim]. "YOU drive me mad!" [crossfire_target.GetSheHe] roars, flying for my throat. My boiling blood takes hold of me and soon the [crossfire_target.GetManWoman] is lying whimpering on the floor.

I have lost track of day and night, and everything reeks. The other prisoners laugh when I start attacking the wall. "Acting out your frustration?", they mock. After a few days, and some ridicule from the jailer, I manage to break loose an iron bar... The feeling of an actual weapon in my hand makes my blood boil.

The [From.GetTitledFirstName] apparently went on a wild rampage through the [host_target.GetCapitalHolding] of [host_target.GetTitledFirstName], and my poor [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in the crossfire! The [From.GetManWoman] even made it out of the dungeons!

The [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetTitledFirstName] went on a wild rampage through my dungeons and escaped the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]! As the [From.GetMadwomanMadman] beat through anyone who came in [From.GetHerHis] path, my poor [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] [kinslayer_target.GetTitledFirstName] was caught in the crossfire.
I'll put on my most intimidating face. Ahem.
You'll approach the [new_recruit.GetManWoman] to explain the initiation duel.
I'll gladly fight to prove myself.
Legendary or not, I'm itching for a duel, my [hero_character.GetLordLady].
You agree to duel whoever it is that §Y[hero_character.Society.GetNameCap]§! has chosen for you.
Why, that little-... The coward!
A sparring duel will take place between §Y[new_recruit.GetTitledName]§! and §Y[duel_target.GetTitledName]§!
Show [new_recruit.GetHerHim] the ropes, [duel_target.GetSisterBrother].
Another member? Interesting, indeed.
Now, that's what we want to see!
Another member, eh? What do you know!
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be invited to join §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!
What a waste of time!
Finally.
I am as disappointed as you are.
You will be unable to join §Y[warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName]§! for years to come.\n
I was just waiting for you to be ready!
We'll play this fair. You're a recruit, like anybody else!
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will report back to you once [new_recruit.GetHerHis] trial is over.\n
I knew you had it in you, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! has joined §Y[new_recruit.Society.GetName]§!.\n
Oh, dear... I am still proud to call you family, [new_recruit.GetFirstName].
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will recover from [new_recruit.GetHerHis] failure.\n
I have just been waiting for you to ask.
§Y[hero_character.GetTitledFirstName]§! of [warrior_lodge_to_join.GetName] will be contacted.\n
Family is what is most important, after all.
I am lucky to have [From.GetHerHim].
I should focus on personal combat.
I should focus on personal combat.
This will lead to the §YDuelist§! trait.\n
I shall get [mentor_target.GetTitledFirstName] to teach me everything [mentor_target.GetSheHe] knows.
I'll of course personally set up [From.GetHerHis] training regime.
I'll always be grateful for your lessons, [mentor_target.GetFirstName].
Oh, a master, am I? Why, yes, I suppose I am!
It took time, but I suppose all that hard work has paid off...!
There is value in the historical records.
Typically, what you'll want to consider in a set-up like this...
Soon, you are talking and gesturing excitedly, receiving "Oohs" and "Aaahs" in an even distribution.\n
Oh, are these sketches of animal footprints? Tell me more!
I can't believe I wasn't always like this.
Thank you, [fellow_member.GetFirstName]. That means a lot.
In your heart, you feel that [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] might frown upon your dedication to these people.\n\n
I feel better.
Aaah, I shall be the scourge of our enemies!
Aaah, by [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]! You are a small sacrifice for my new-gained strength!
I will not let this insult stand!
I am sure we will settle this, in time...
A duel? Yes, that is what I am saying.
Thank you.
I would be angry, if I wasn't so humiliated...
Aaargh! Just leave me alone.
You want to go again?! I can do this all day!
Get out of my way! I am getting OUT of here!
Actually, I would rather not bloody my knuckles.
You will not be attempting to join §Y[hero_character.Society.GetNameCap]§!.
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! will be §Rbanned§! from joining §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!, for 10 years
Why, you ungrateful little...!
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is clearly not ready for this commitment.\n
You almost make me wish I hadn't left...
You suddenly feel a little nostalgic.\n
I expected more, honestly.
§Y[new_recruit.GetTitledFirstName]§! blinks away a tear.\n
[recruiting_parent.GetFatherMotherCap], I will carve my own path.
Your [recruiting_parent.GetFatherMother] is disappointed.\n
I am an embarrassment.
This is not the end of my story! Nay, [From.GetSheHe] doesn't KNOW me...!
You'll show [From.GetHerHim]...!
You will be §Rbanned§! from joining §Y[Root.Society.GetName]§!, for 10 years
I want to delve deeper into strategic thinking.
I want to delve deeper into strategic thinking.
This will lead to the §YStrategist§! trait.\n
I will discreetly hire someone to instruct me.
I will loan [From.GetHerHim] some of my best veterans to practice with.
I think I am more of a visual learner.
What about the actual capturing...? Let's talk more about that!
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is with me.
W-who... Whose blood is this?!
My [kinslayer_target.GetRootRelation] should have known to stay out of the way.
Oh, my [combatant_2.GetLordLady], you misunderstand! I did not mean to imply... I, uhm... *gulp*
Get out of my w- Oh, no! I'm sorry! Are you hurt?
Are you trying to impress me or something?
You scowl at the excited [new_recruit.GetManWoman].\n
I shall spend more time outdoors, hunting!
I want to spend more time outdoors, hunting!
This will lead to the §YHunter§! trait.\n
I think I would rather go about this alone.
I was just... Curses, someone help us out here!
On second thought, I like my current way of life.
Then again, I like my current way of life.
The Rage of a Prisoner
§Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! breaks out of prison.
Your [recruiting_parent.GetRootRelation] enjoys the news.\n\n
Proving Your Worth
